title: 허영식
content:
허영식은 서울
자연과학대학
수학과
교수이다.
학력
BS (93), MS (95), Ph.D (00) all in mathematics, KAIST
경력
Senior Engineer (00-04), Samsung Electronics
Professor of Mathematics (04 ~ ), Hanyang University
연구관심분야
Mathematics: Low dim'al topology - Knot theory - Graphs in 3-space
Mutimedia technology:  Image search, Color reproduction  (Not active now)
